channel.title: Lacrosse on Felix
channel.description: Recent content in Lacrosse on Felix

item.title: I Herts Lacrosse 3.0: Fresher’s Tournament
item.author: Anthony Onwuli,
item.description: The University of Hertfordshire Lacrosse club hosted a tournament to get freshers playing lacrosse, giving them a lot more game time and allowing them to develop their sticks skills. How else would you spend your Sunday? Playing lacrosse of course! The Men’s 2s gathered at around midday, ready to …

item.title: Women’s Lacrosse at the Jan Kiddle Cup
item.author: Zoe Chu,
item.description: The Jan Kiddle cup is a development tournament aimed at players just starting out at lacrosse, encouraging improved stick skills and game play. In the early hours of Saturday, 4th November stood a crowd of lacrosse freshers, ready to smash the day ahead. Morale started out low as we arrived in muddy …
